docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Trade Commission on Friday refused to tip its hand on how it may be react to allegations that Herbalife is a fraud, but said it is taking a lawmaker's concerns about the company seriously and underscored its record of shutting down pyramid schemes.

docs.lead_paragraph: Some 9 million poor women and young children who receive federal food assistance under the U.S. government's so-called WIC program will have greater access to fruits, vegetables and whole grains under an overhaul of the program unveiled on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A modest step in the right direction for a small slice of the population suggests further gains may be possible.
docs.abstract: Editorial cites report in The Journal of the American Medical Assn that found obesity rate in young children has dropped; holds finding is glimmer of good news in the struggle to control obesity in the United States; supports public policies that aim to curb youth obesity, like changes in nutrition labels proposed by the Food and Drug Administration.

docs.lead_paragraph: Packaged foods sold in the United States would display calorie counts more prominently and include the amount of added sugar under a proposal to significantly update nutritional labels for the first time in 20 years as health officials seek to reduce obesity and combat related diseases such as diabetes.
